sx.blah.discord.util

Class BotInviteBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • sx.blah.discord.util.BotInviteBuilder

  • public class BotInviteBuilder
extends Object
    This is a utility class to build invite links for server owners to invite your bot.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BotInviteBuilder(IDiscordClient client) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String build()
      Builds the actual invite link.
      String toString()
      Wrapper for build().
      BotInviteBuilder withClientID(String id)
      This replaces the client id provided by your IDiscordClient instance.
      BotInviteBuilder withGuild(IGuild guild)
      This makes the invite link specific to the given guild.
      BotInviteBuilder withPermissions(EnumSet<Permissions> permissions)
      This makes the invite link request specific permissions for the bot when it joins.
